name: Around (m-bt)
description:
This game is an endless runner where player is rotating around generated planets.
Main goal is to orbit as many times as you can (avoiding asteroids)!

Controls
  • Change the orbit with [UP] and [DOWN] arrow keys. 
  • Shoot asteroids by pressing [SPACEBAR] (you can do this only once per loop).
Created by
  • Michał Biernat
  • Anna Hosumbek

Made in Phaser CE
